name: Boots Quest DX (itch)
description:
or: the BOOT-SHINER'S TALE, being a Narrative of one Creature's INNER JOURNEY to the very Precipice of Spiritual Vision, through the Lense of Cobblecraft, and some sundry other Silly Things that happened

Features of Play:

  • Many Puzzles, Mysteries, and Quests
  • Persons to encounter in frank Exchange of Ideas
  • There is Jumping
  • A vast Haberdashery (20+ Hats) from which to choose Suitable Adornment
  • The heart-pounding Purchase of Goods
  • Diurnal and Nocturnal Environs both
  • Up to a few Hours' Divertment, as may best suit your Pleasure

Supported Means of Control:

  • Arrow keys + Z / X / C
  • WASD + J / K / L
  • Or Even A Gamepad If Ye Possess One
